entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with a few showers beginning this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon with a few showers beginning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 21. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late in the evening and overnight. Showers beginning before morning. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
